findings.title: A01.Unprotected addBlacklistMember function
findings.description: The addBlacklistMember function is unprotected and can be accessed publicly.

findings.title: Possible reentrancy vulnerability in transferOwner function
findings.description: Reentrancy vulnerability may occur in the transferOwner function.

findings.title: A03.Insecure use of TaxDistribution function
findings.description: Insecure usage of TaxDistribution function can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: A04.Unprotected upgradeToLvl2 function
findings.description: Unprotected upgradeToLvl2 function allows unauthorized access and upgrades.

findings.title: Possible front-running vulnerability in createNodes function
findings.description: Front-running vulnerability may exist in createNodes function, allowing malicious actors to manipulate transactions.

findings.title: A06.Insecure use of changeNFTContract function
findings.description: Insecure use of changeNFTContract function can lead to unauthorized changes or access control issues.

findings.title: A07.Unprotected withdrawToken function
findings.description: The withdrawToken function does not have any access modifiers or restrictions, making it vulnerable to unauthorized withdrawals.

findings.title: Possible reentrancy vulnerability in transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function may be vulnerable to reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: A09.Insecure use of addNoTaxMember function
findings.description: Insecure usage of addNoTaxMember function may lead to unauthorized access or privilege escalation.

findings.title: A10.Unprotected changeLiquidityPool function
findings.description: The changeLiquidityPool function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Possible front-running vulnerability in addPresaleContract function
A12.Insecure use of addGameContract function
findings.description: Insecure usage of the addGameContract function can lead to potential security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: A13.Unprotected addTraderJoe function
findings.description: The addTraderJoe function lacks access control or authentication mechanisms, allowing unauthorized users to call it.

findings.title: Possible reentrancy vulnerability in TaxDistributionFrom function
findings.description: The TaxDistributionFrom function has a potential reentrancy vulnerability.
